burgers.name: New Bacon-ings
trivia: A pun on the phrase 'New Beginnings', and reference to the restaurant's grand re-re-re opening

burgers.name: The Child Mollester
trivia: A reference to child molesters' using candy to lure their victims
This was written by Louise
One person was shown to have ordered the burger, which made Bob very uneasy and refused to let Tina or Louise serve the man

burgers.name: Foot Feta-ish Burger
trivia: Comes with feta cheese
A pun on 'foot fetish'
Bob intended this to be the Never Been Feta burger, but Louise changed it

burgers.name: Tunami
trivia: A portmanteau of the words 'tuna' and 'tsunami'
The Tunami is Gloria's recipe, which Linda deemed the Burger of the Day while Bob was trapped in the wall

burgers.name: Mission A-Corn-Plished Burger
trivia: Pun on the phrase 'Mission accomplished'

burgers.name: Pepper Don't Preach Burger
trivia: A pun on the 1986 song by Madonna entitled 'Papa Don't Preach'

burgers.name: Rest in Peas Burger
trivia: A pun on the phrase 'rest in peace,' and a reference to the death of the cow, Moolissa.
Comes with snap peas and carrots
Bob's 100,000th burger
Made of meat from Moo-Lissa

burgers.name: Fig-eta Bout It Burger
trivia: A pun on the phrase 'Forger about it'

burgers.name: Chevre Which Way But Loose Burger
trivia: A pun on the 1978 film Every Which Way But Loose

burgers.name: The Roquefort Files Burger
trivia: A pun on the TV series 'The Rockford Files'

burgers.name: These Collards Don't Run Burger
trivia: A pun on the phrase 'These colors don't run.'

burgers.name: Totally Radish Burger
trivia: A play on the phrase 'Totally rad'

burgers.name: Onion Burger - Grilled...To Death!
trivia: A reference to the murder mystery in Linda's dinner theatre

burgers.name: Last of the Mo-Jicama Burger
trivia: A pun on The Last of the Mohicans

burgers.name: Olive And Let Die Burger
trivia: A reference to the 1973 James Bond film Live and Let Die

burgers.name: Thank God It's Fried Egg Burger
trivia: A play on the saying 'Thank God it's Friday'

burgers.name: Camembert-ly Legal Burger
trivia: A pun on the magazine Barely Legal

burgers.name: Krauted House Burger
trivia: A play on a New Zealand/Australian band Crowded House. Also alludes to the situation in the Belcher household during this episode

burgers.name: Poblano Picasso Burger
trivia: A reference to the Spanish painter Pablo Picasso
A reference to the plot of Linda's sister displaying her art in the shop

burgers.name: Salvador Cauliflower Burger
trivia: A reference to the Spanish painter Salvador Dal√≠
A reference to the plot of Linda's sister displaying her art in the shop

burgers.name: Shoot out at the Okra Corral Burger
trivia: A reference to the events of Gunfight at the O.K. Corral, a 1957 Western

burgers.name: Hit Me With Your Best Shallot Burger
trivia: A play on the saying (and Pat Benetar hit song) 'Hit me with your best shot.'

burgers.name: The Sound & The Curry Burger
trivia: A reference to the novel The Sound & the Fury

burgers.name: I've Created a Muenster Burger
trivia: A reference to a Frankenstein quote

burgers.name: Something's NOT Fishy Burger
trivia: Reference to the phrase 'Something's fishy'

burgers.name: One Fish, Two Fish, Red Fish Hamburger
trivia: A reference to Dr. Seuss book 'One Fish, Two Fish, Red Fish, Blue Fish'

burgers.name: Take Me Out To The Burger
trivia: A play on the song 'Take Me Out To The Ball Game.'

burgers.name: I'm Mad About Saffron
trivia: A reference to a lyric from the song 'Mellow Yellow' by Donovan

burgers.name: Burger A La Mode
trivia: Possible reference to 'pie A La Mode' (pie with ice cream)

burgers.name: Shake Your Honeymaker Burger
trivia: A reference to the song 'Shake Your Moneymaker' by Elmore James

burgers.name: Use It Or Bleus It Burger
trivia: A play on the saying 'Use it or lose it'

burgers.name: The One Yam Band Burger
trivia: A play on the phrase 'One Man Band'

burgers.name: Papaya Was A Rolling Stone Burger
trivia: A play on the song 'Papa Was a Rollin Stone' by the group The Undisputed Truth

burgers.name: Good Night and Good Leek Burger
trivia: A reference to newsman Edward R. Murrow's sign-off, 'Good night and good luck'

burgers.name: Band On The Bun Burger
trivia: A play on the song and album 'Band on the Run' by Wings

burgers.name: Chorizo Your Own Adventure Burger
trivia: A reference to the 'Choose Your Own Adventure' books where the readers get to choose between two or more scenarios in a story

burgers.name: Where Have You Been All My Life Burger
trivia: A play on the song 'Where Have You Been (All My Life)'

burgers.name: It's fun to eat at the rYeMCA Burger
trivia: A reference to a lyric from the song 'Y.M.C.A. by The Village People

burgers.name: If Looks Could Kale Burger
trivia: A play on the saying 'If looks could kill'

burgers.name: Little Swiss Bunshine Burger
trivia: A reference to the 2006 film Little Miss Sunshine

burgers.name: Girls Just Wanna Have Fennel Burger
trivia: Bob cooks this burger for Moody Foodie, the food critic
A reference to the song 'Girls Just Want to Have Fun' by Cyndi Lauper

burgers.name: The Final Kraut Down Burger
trivia: A reference to the song 'The Final Countdown' by the band Europe

burgers.name: Sit and Spinach Burger
trivia: A reference to the popular Sit 'n Spin toy from the 80's

burgers.name: Sweaty Palms Burger
trivia: A pun on 'sweaty palms'

burgers.name: Poutine on the Ritz Burger
trivia: A reference to the song written by Irving Berlin (1927) and the musical film Puttin' on the Ritz (1930) based on the song

burgers.name: Mesclun Around Burger
trivia: A play on the phrase 'Messin' Around'

burgers.name: The Don't Get Creme Fraiche With Me Burger
trivia: A play on the saying 'Don't get fresh with me'

burgers.name: The Don't Get Creme Fraiche With Me Burger
trivia: A play on the saying 'Don't get fresh with me'
